summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the extension until June 30, 1982 of a contract with Mountain Tree Farm Company for the sale and removal of certain timber in Section 11, 12, 13 and 14, Township 22 North, Range 7 East, W.M.; and such blowdown timber as designated by the City in Township 22 North, Range 7 East, Township 22 North, Range 7 East, and Township 22 North, Range 8 East, W.M. in the Cedar River Watershed.
